channel.title: Client isn't Working
channel.description:
So, I got a new Source & Client today (Same Download Package), keep in mind it's TeamTorva source. All credits to the owners first off. But, as I tried to run the server just so I could login. The Default IP is 0.0.0.0 which should also be the client, but when I try to Login to the Client it says "Error Connecting To Server." I don't know what's wrong I may be a new guy for asking, but it has been a while since I have coded and I have no Idea what to do.
If someone could help me with this problem it would be greatly appreciated.
- Thanks, LanePker

item.title: Client isn't Working
item.dc:creator: @xXSh0ckXx xXSh0ckXx
item.description:
@xXSh0ckXx wrote:

Go to your client, search for client class (client.java) and search for something similar to ‘ip’, change it to 127.0.0.1 nd’ enjoy. No server sided things needed, if you still have questions leave a PM or add me in skype: yasinouha

Kind regards,
Sh0ck

Read full topic

item.title: Client isn't Working
item.dc:creator: @Lanepker Lanepker
item.description:
@Lanepker wrote:

Pure_:

Should be is not the same as actually is. I suggest you go change the ip and compile it, make sure the ports match too.

Well I was going to do that but this is the only file I can find with ip in it, I can’t find any ports.

UIManager.setLookAndFeel(UIManager.getSystemLookAndFeelClassName());
sign.signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getByName(“0.0.0.0”));
initUI();
} catch(Exception ex) {
ex.printStackTrace();
}

And

public URL getCodeBase() {
	try {
		return new URL("http://0.0.0.0/cache");
	} catch (Exception e) {
		return super.getCodeBase();
	}

Read full topic
